description:
Fortune Telling
In Bunji`s class, fortune telling is becoming quite big with the girls, and it seems that Bunji and Chinatsu are the most compatible no matter what fortune telling method is used. With that, Chinatsu is to go over to Bunji`s place, but...
Boxed Lunch
It`s a day where the whole school has a sketch competition. Fumi is not so good at drawing. In order to make herself feel better, she gets Mom to make her a character boxed lunch. When she opens the cover, Bunji`s exciting lunch is inside!
Strawberry, An Encounter
Meanwhile, Bunji and his friends stopped sketching and went out to play. Getting lost at a strawberry farm, they got caught by an old man farmer and Bunji didn`t manage to escape.
DNA
Recently, Bunji has started to resemble Dad. If he grows up to be an adult, there`s one thing to do: play ball! So says Dad, who`s excited...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fortune Telling / Boxed Lunch / Strawberry, An Encounter / Chip Off the Old Block
占い / お弁当 / イチゴ一会 / DNA
